briefTitle: Double-blind Trial to Investigate Efficacy and Tolerance of Ambroxol Lozenges 20 mg in Sore Throat
officialTitle: Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Trial to Investigate the Efficacy and Tolerance of Ambroxol Lozenges 20 mg in the Treatment of Sore Throat in Patients With Acute Viral Pharyngitis
summary: The aim of this trial is to investigate the efficacy and tolerance of Ambroxol lozenges 20 mg in the treatment of sore throat in patients with acute viral pharyngitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Sum of Pain Intensity Difference (SPIDnorm)-Time-weighted Average of the Pain Intensity Difference (PID) From Pre-dose Baseline Over the First 3 Hours After the First Lozenge Expressed as a Ratio of the Pre-dose Baseline
